name: Teddy (polymyth)
description:
Our first game jam ever! Submitted to the August 2022 PIG Squad Summer Slow Jam The game is best enjoyed in full screen with sound.
CONTROLS:
  • Left Click to Interact
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Patrick Fye : Programming  - Art - Sound Design - Music Matt Tye : Programming - 3D Modeling - Sound Design
